column2: of things you experienced in the past

column1: And when we accept ourselves fully

They are the best individuals to ask for assistance in removing deep pain that’s stuck within our physical and auric body.

column1: And being that PTSD can also be passed down
column2: we can be born with the trauma that our ancestors held—"

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-10-29 22:41:24+00:00; ;1454216827790299143;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@subvrtmag It looks like pop-up centers in the places that need them the most. Pop-up reiki
column4: pop-up divinations
column5: pop-up vendors with cleansing baths & other spiritual-based products to help our communities in real time.

column1: A community center founded on spiritual healing would also be ideal."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-10-29 22:37:06+00:00; ;1454215744154132483;en;2;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;"@xtendo_clip @subvrtmag I actually didn’t use any books when I began my journey because there was none or the accurate books (like the Fundamentals of the Yoruba Religion) were out of print.

column1: Ifa & Orisa is heavy on the oral mentor to student way of learning and passing tradition."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-10-29 22:34:19+00:00; ;1454215046570156043;en;3;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@subvrtmag Get to know your ancestors first
column4: because every African/Diasporic Traditional Religion is founded on ancestral veneration.

column1: Creating a formal space for them where you can lay food offerings & prayer will allow you to be guided to the safest and best resources for other practices."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango

When you take peoples indigenous spirits away from them
column4: you take away their strength & hope.

column1: Assisting the diaspora and continental Africans on their way back home is an incredible honor that I’m grateful to do everyday."

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-10-29 22:28:32+00:00; ;1454213589326311426;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@subvrtmag @FalowoOjose To me
column4: being a priestess is not just the title of permission you gain to be able to work with certain African divinities—but how you’re able to transform and assist people’s lives.

column1: Globally all black folk struggle with a sense of homelessness. My work has always been focused—"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-10-29 22:22:14+00:00; ;1454212003149619207;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@subvrtmag The summer before I went off to Howard U
column4: I met my mentor/Oluwo @FalowoOjose who lived only an hour away from me at the time and gotten a formal divination with him.

column1: The divination said
column2: “Things will now start to make more sense.” And things did."

column4: demonic forces
column5: or hellfire in Ifa
column6: there are no concepts that come close to that.

column1: In Ifa
column2: we have “Ajogun” which are just the negative forces that exist on Earth that we cannot see. Like Iku (death)
column3: Arun (sickness)
column4: Ofo (loss)
column5: Egba (stagnancy)
column6: etc."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-30 00:15:19+00:00; ;1410029143090212867;en;120;0;2;15;Twitter for iPhone;"Isn’t it juicy so far? Well it isn’t done yet! There’s 5 stages of Creation
column4: and I compiled all of it here! From the creation of humanity
column5: to the great flood
column6: to the second round of human creation and etc. Free to read 💛

column1: https://t.co/wYXxU4u6GP"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-30 00:15:19+00:00; ;1410029142041636866;en;81;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"On the 303rd day
column4: the great being emerged. Their name was
column5: “Olodu-Ikoko ti ntan Osumare.”

column1: Meaning: “The owner of the pot that brings forth the rainbow light.”
Olodumare for short. The Creator of our world
column2: who was added right before us."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-30 00:15:18+00:00; ;1410029140980477953;en;45;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"Orunmila told Ile Ayé that there will be a great being larger than everything in our own universe and to lay sacrifice to manifest this into reality.

column1: So they did
column2: and placed the materials in a large pot for 303 days. And throughout these days
column3: a large rainbow was shooting out!"

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-30 00:15:18+00:00; ;1410029138493292547;en;47;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"3. The Irunmole who governs Earth (Ile Ayé) was getting lonely.

column1: She went to Orunmila (the diviner
column3: keeper of Ifa) for a Divination and without any tools
column4: Orunmila told her to place her palm down on the Earth and the odu Oyeku Logbe appeared in the soil.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-30 00:15:18+00:00; ;1410029137499234309;en;53;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"2. The stars were running into each other.

column1: This issue was called the “war of the stars.” Akamara assigned Irunmole to create orbital patterns so they wouldn’t clash into each other & create wars in heaven.
It is said that the Irunmole are still creating orbital patterns."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-30 00:15:17+00:00; ;1410029136542941189;en;52;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"1. The stars were too hot.

column1: And being too hot meant they could not support life
column2: so Akamara assigned a higher Irunmole with the responsibility of cooling down the stars.

column1: It is said that the Irunmole are still cooling stars down till this day
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-30 00:15:17+00:00; ;1410029135565672448;en;63;0;1;1;Twitter for iPhone;"Then it exploded—bursting stars
column4: galaxies
column5: and the cosmos from the bag of sand.

column1: Akamara would then create the Irunmole
column2: the celestial beings who’s role is to assist in the creation of the many universes (and later humanity).

column1: After the cosmos was born
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-30 00:15:17+00:00; ;1410029133879459840;en;79;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"Before there was anything
column4: there was nothing. Except for this being named Akamara that existed in nothingness.

column1: From the abyss
column2: Akamara created a bag of sand and blew their breath into it. The bag would start to get warm
column3: filling up with hot gasses"

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-29 00:36:00+00:00; ;1409671962247405576;en;271;0;1;12;Twitter for iPhone;"Stage 3: Ayanmo

column1: It means: “that which is affixed to oneself”
Olodumare (the Creator) will seal these traits onto your ori
column2: and these are things that cannot be altered. Such as:

column1: • Our birth parents/lineages
• Our race
• Physical traits
• Other traits the creator has affixed"

column4: “Which Orisa am I child of?”
column5: “What’s the difference between Lucumi & Ifa?”

column1: And more!
https://t.co/isBIPTBvee"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-15 19:29:38+00:00; ;1404883819384221701;en;222;1;2;22;Twitter for iPhone;"And remember:

column1: • We communicate with the orisa & Ifa through traditional Divination methods
• Any ‘priest’ that comes into your DMs unsolicited wants to scam you. True priests DO NOT chase."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-15 19:29:37+00:00; ;1404883816024625153;en;158;0;1;7;Twitter for iPhone;"It is important to treat elders in this tradition with respect and not the expectation that they must teach you!

column1: Though we can find many of the orisa in nature
column2: the wisdom of the orisa resides within their priests. Respecting the priest gives you direct blessings from the orisa."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-15 19:29:37+00:00; ;1404883814325932032;en;201;1;1;19;Twitter for iPhone;"Everyone can get Ifa Divination & work done
column4: but not everyone needs to be initiated.

column1: Ifa can let us know if this path is not even in alignment with someone’s destiny. The Creator gave you your ori (higher self) to be your own god on Earth. Choose what resonates with your spirit."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-15 19:29:36+00:00; ;1404883811528290307;en;193;3;1;12;Twitter for iPhone;"For two reasons:

column1: 1. So you can choose the correct elders and ile (spiritual house) to learn from and not get taken advantage of.
2. So you can be sure. Initiation into the Ifa & Orisa tradition is a lifelong commitment. I want to emphasize this. Do not rush into this."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-15 19:29:36+00:00; ;1404883808785215492;en;224;1;1;17;Twitter for iPhone;"Self-teaching and being a solitude practitioner doesn’t exist here. Ifa & Orisa depends on community involvement. You are nothing without those around you. Do not burden yourself by trying to learn alone
column4: it will be impossible.

column1: Because of this
column2: it’s important to take your time!"

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-15 19:29:35+00:00; ;1404883806440636417;en;196;1;1;12;Twitter for iPhone;"Because Ifa & Orisa is an oral secretive tradition
column4: there will never be a book that will teach you everything.

column1: Remember
column2: Ifa is wisdom. And you learn this wisdom by properly studying at the feet of elders. The foundation of Ifa & Orisa depends on the student-teacher dynamic."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-15 19:29:35+00:00; ;1404883805169668101;en;212;0;1;15;Twitter for iPhone;"Though we work with orisa
column4: the true purpose of Ifa & Orisa is to bring us closer to alignment with our destiny and our indestructible spirit utilizing the tools that the Creator has left for us on Earth.

column1: The orisa are one of those tools
column2: with the mission to assist humanity."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-15 19:29:34+00:00; ;1404883803085082634;en;258;2;2;15;Twitter for iPhone;"Isese Ifa & Orisa is the oral indigenous spiritual divination system of the Yoruba people within Nigeria.

column1: It is not just a religious practice
column2: it is wisdom. Filled with properties that give us greater connection to nature
column3: the cosmos
column4: and ourselves."

column4: @NegarraAKudumu recommended The Sibyls: The First Prophetess of Mami Wata by Mama Zogbe and I recommend it too!

column1: Also I recommend Olokun: Owner of Rivers & Seas by John Mason. https://t.co/FASbYkIXFI"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-13 22:00:23+00:00; ;1404196980755206150;en;365;0;2;46;Twitter for iPhone;"Because when enslaved Africans jumped off ships
column4: their spirits merged with the ocean. Another reason why many black folk have subconscious trauma with water.

column1: But
column2: remember water has no enemy. When you respect water
column3: it will not harm you."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-13 22:00:23+00:00; ;1404196979815727104;en;156;0;2;23;Twitter for iPhone;"Many lineages on the coastal side create pacts with these water spirits for assistance with fishing
column4: protection from death when journeying on water
column5: great wealth
column6: and fertility.

column1: Black Americans can carry specific water spirits from the Atlantic because of the slave trade ⤵️"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-06-13 22:00:23+00:00; ;1404196978527985664;en;403;7;6;66;Twitter for iPhone;"Mami Wata represents the specific cluster of water spirits from West Africa. column3: Oba
column4: the female version of Olokun and Erinle etc https://t.co/mrYVeUdFR6"

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-14 17:58:12+00:00; ;1382392759517122561;en;2690;6;4;161;Twitter for iPhone;"ADHD people have higher divorce rates because of all the above.

column1: Lack of understanding from partners with our symptoms
column2: unintentionally inattentive after a period of hyper focus
column3: hyper focusing on everything that isn’t you
column4: etc."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-14 17:54:22+00:00; ;1382391796706254854;en;3915;37;5;375;Twitter for iPhone;"And on the flip side
column4: those who are dating people with ADHD—it would tremendously help you to learn more about your partner with grace and patience.

column1: Be mindful of the language you use when they forget something
column3: get distracted etc. Understanding gifts longevity."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-14 17:49:03+00:00; ;1382390456391245824;en;4195;50;9;353;Twitter for iPhone;"If you are ADHD and dating
column4: or you are dating someone with ADHD—it’s more important than ever to do your best to keep the relationship new and stimulating. Go to new places for your dates
column5: do different activities
column6: etc.

column1: And be honest about your feelings and what isn’t working!"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-14 17:44:09+00:00; ;1382389224985526273;en;4312;143;14;305;Twitter for iPhone;"ADHD people may have a string of short romantic encounters due to this
column4: affecting their self-esteem of loving and being loved.

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-14 17:44:09+00:00; ;1382389224100524032;en;4590;65;6;283;Twitter for iPhone;"The honeymoon rise & fall phase is more aggressive with ADHD. column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-14 17:44:09+00:00; ;1382389223152574465;en;5482;165;2;378;Twitter for iPhone;"It’s easy for us to hyper focus on a new partner. To learn all about them
column4: to spend time with them

column1: Then something weird happens

column4: lives

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-11 05:58:13+00:00; ;1381124409763753984;en;706;4;8;94;Twitter for iPhone;"ADHD people are susceptible to suffering with addiction as a way to self-medicate and cope with their symptoms. ADHD people can have depression & anxiety as a comorbidity (jointed diagnosis)
column4: and are at a higher risk for su*c*de.

column1: Info on neurodiversity saves lives
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-11 05:49:22+00:00; ;1381122182546300931;en;608;3;3;47;Twitter for iPhone;"Getting diagnosed as an adult doesn’t mean your ADHD is less manageable.

column1: Support doesn’t start & end at medication
column2: it’s beyond that. It’s finding others who are just like you
column3: getting better resources to help
column4: and the missing puzzle piece for everything to start making sense."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-11 05:49:22+00:00; ;1381122180415643649;en;642;2;1;56;Twitter for iPhone;"I tweet for you
column4: because same. I delayed getting evaluated because I kept trying to convince myself that all I needed to do was try harder
column5: read anti-procrastination books
column6: and “apply myself”.

column1: Stop gaslighting. Advocate for yourself and your lived experiences."

column4: finish that art piece
column5: start that podcast

column1: It has always been bigger than you."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 23:12:46+00:00; ;1379572822712930309;en;941;5;4;179;Twitter for iPhone;"Keep this Yoruba Proverb with you: “Suuru ni baba iwa”

column1: It means
column2: “Patience is the father of good character.”

column1: When we can be patient enough with the situations that happen around us
column2: we can respond to them. Responding instead of reacting leads us to make better choices."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 23:12:46+00:00; ;1379572821110763520;en;1056;4;2;177;Twitter for iPhone;"People will drive you up the path of anger
column4: just to see if you’ll walk it. Don’t.

column1: Anger is a powerful emotion of passion and we shouldn’t fear it.
But
column2: it can create a toll on the body when overextended. Stress in excess will kill you."

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 16:44:05+00:00; ;1379475005130608642;en;331;2;3;36;Twitter for iPhone;ADHD is also a spectrum. Creating spaces to destigmatize different ways of learning

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 16:39:55+00:00; ;1379473956713996290;en;404;0;1;67;Twitter for iPhone;"I think it’s a good thing that people know how their brain functions whether they have ADHD or not.

column1: Advocating for neurodiversity and how two brains are not alike will allow us to have a society where we don’t have toxic viewpoints on productivity and laziness."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 16:39:54+00:00; ;1379473954948153347;en;856;3;3;147;Twitter for iPhone;"A lot of people will have symptoms of ADHD and not actually have ADHD.

column1: But
column2: that also means that people are more neurodiverse than what society shows. People resonating with these symptoms and learning about what works for their brains is the entire point of neurodiversity. https://t.co/0pVpbEXdjm"

column2: but learning about your brain will."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 02:51:49+00:00; ;1379265559993417731;en;6829;83;10;567;Twitter for iPhone;"Those with ADHD also struggle with Rejection Sensitivity. Being overly sensitive to anything they perceive as rejection or criticism
column4: because we are more criticized than our peers.

column1: This leads to a lot of shame and guilt for not functioning like other people."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 02:51:49+00:00; ;1379265559167131648;en;6878;44;9;577;Twitter for iPhone;"Executive Dysfunction is the basis of ADHD

column1: It’s the dysfunction in areas like:
• Activation (starting new tasks)
• Focus
• Effort
• Emotion (those with ADHD have trouble regulating their emotional responses)
• Memory
• Action"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 02:41:55+00:00; ;1379263066232217600;en;8044;84;12;487;Twitter for iPhone;Which is why racing against deadlines gives us sudden motivation we didn’t have before
column4: starting something that’s new to us
column5: or anything we personally love or interested in.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 02:41:54+00:00; ;1379263064831320073;en;8081;73;8;598;Twitter for iPhone;"Why is it hard to get tasks started? Because the mind of someone with ADHD is running low on dopamine.

column1: Anything that’s lengthy or boring doesn’t stand a chance against our brains that’s constantly craving stimulation."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 02:27:40+00:00; ;1379259480903389187;en;8521;51;11;687;Twitter for iPhone;"People with ADHD have a deficit in activation (which is the opposite of procrastination). It’s *extremely* difficult to get tasks started.

column1: To someone who doesn’t have ADHD it seems like laziness or being unproductive. But what is productivity anyway?"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 02:22:42+00:00; ;1379258233316122625;en;9862;50;11;764;Twitter for iPhone;"I think about this person a lot
column4: because I was this person.

column1: The abuse you tolerate from others because there are things that are difficult for you
column2: leads you to a life where you think there’s something wrong with you.

column1: Your brain works differently. And that’s okay."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 02:20:14+00:00; ;1379257610621321217;en;162390;3463;630;20725;Twitter for iPhone;There’s someone out there that thinks they’re lazy when they just have undiagnosed ADHD.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 01:14:23+00:00; ;1379241040104849408;en;540;17;4;85;Twitter for iPhone;"And if you’re the person that has what the other wants
column4: you are also at risk for being taken advantage of.

column1: Love easily becomes hate. The person that was your biggest fan can become your worst enemy."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 01:14:23+00:00; ;1379241038515159043;en;459;1;1;71;Twitter for iPhone;"A lot things can skew friendship dynamics
column4: and it’s usually caused by one party having something that the other desires
column5: like money
column6: fame
column7: clout etc. Because being their friend means access to these unattainable spaces.

column1: It’s fake and it puts you at risk for abuse."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 01:01:57+00:00; ;1379237909069500424;en;753;3;1;133;Twitter for iPhone;"Over-glorification of someone in a “friendship” destroys the dynamic of mutual trust & acceptance.

column1: They may fall from the height you put them on
column2: but you’ll also be crushed by the debris."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-06 00:57:28+00:00; ;1379236783100203008;en;1168;14;4;215;Twitter for iPhone;"Ask yourself if you really want to be someone’s friend or do you want to be in proximity to them because of status
column4: resources
column5: knowledge etc.

column1: When you idealize a person
column2: you can put yourself in a vulnerable position to be used by them."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-05 17:22:41+00:00; ;1379122332720058369;en;51;1;0;3;Twitter for iPhone;@BrujaBanton Ifa is definitely a religion. Like what do you mean after I get an Orisa that I can’t take it back and it’s forever 💀

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-05 17:19:40+00:00; ;1379121572737380353;en;97;0;2;4;Twitter for iPhone;"So when you get into all these classes
column4: seminars
column5: and docs—please know that it can’t replace true mentorship with elders you trust.

column1: You are trained to recognize certain elements & cues to know what to do next
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-05 17:13:42+00:00; ;1379120072640303107;en;104;0;1;2;Twitter for iPhone;"This is how children who grew up in the tradition become fluent in all the Odus when they’re a teenager.

column1: You retain more information when it’s being taught you hands-on and orally
column2: rather than being expected to read a few chapters and show up for a quiz."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-05 17:10:06+00:00; ;1379119166020538370;en;95;0;1;6;Twitter for iPhone;"This why books are seldom in the religion. It’s a practice that relies on mentorship & oral study.

column1: The true traditional way of learning Ifa & Orisa is by living with your elders and helping them around their compound to then level up to help them with spiritual work."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-05 17:10:06+00:00; ;1379119164732928001;en;77;0;1;5;Twitter for iPhone;"When you further your studies and finally step into an ile which is a temple or spiritual house—the Oluwo and/or the Iyalode are your main elders.

column1: They will have the right to not disclose certain information of the tradition with you until you’re ready for it."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-05 17:10:06+00:00; ;1379119163713675266;en;114;0;1;11;Twitter for iPhone;"You can find your *connection* to the Orisa in nature
column4: but the *wisdom* is within their priests.

column1: Ifa & Orisa is not a solitude practice but one that depends on community and apprenticeship."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-05 17:10:05+00:00; ;1379119161922760706;en;333;7;3;42;Twitter for iPhone;"This is something that I really want to drive into people’s heads.

column1: The Ifa philosophy
column3: and religion is one that relies on the hierarchy of eldership.

column1: If you cannot handle someone telling you what to do
column2: this practice is not for you. https://t.co/8SmWFerMGM"

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-05 16:57:11+00:00; ;1379115915707613187;en;124;0;1;4;Twitter for iPhone;"The last tweet:

column1: Opening the orisa pot can also anger the Iyaami. I personally don’t touch my altars when I menstruate
column2: but I make sure to do my rites regardless.

column1: Menstruation is powerful and a tool
column2: it’s not a crutch. It’s not unclean or any of that misogynistic trash."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-05 16:43:13+00:00; ;1379112398704025602;en;110;0;2;6;Twitter for iPhone;"The concept of Odu is literally referred to as the womb. Everything is born from the womb
column4: therefore anything is in the Odu—from the stars to the garbage can

column1: Manifest and materialize things in conjunct with your cycle and you’ll for sure notice a difference in speed & intensity."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-04-05 16:39:13+00:00; ;1379111393274834953;en;94;4;1;5;Twitter for iPhone;"Menstruation (or any fluid secreted from the vaginal region) is an incredible way to energetically tie someone to you—to the point of obsession.

It’s not a weakness to think differently. If you resonate with anything I have said
column4: I’d urge you to seek out a community with others who are similar to you for support/resources.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 22:48:56+00:00; ;1375218169925746692;en;859;3;1;67;Twitter for iPhone;"ADHD has many crossovers with other mood & cognitive disorders. So many
column4: that it is often dually diagnosed with ASD (Autism Spectrum Disorder).

column1: The symptoms can cross into many coexisting conditions that a person with ADHD has. Such as anxiety
column3: sleep disorders
column4: etc."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 22:42:51+00:00; ;1375216640045031427;en;1208;8;1;120;Twitter for iPhone;The mental impacts ADHD is due to the disorder itself
column4: but also due to the societal challenges of having ADHD. Lack of accommodation
column5: support and understanding creates a breeding ground for depression. And why many people may get diagnosed with anxiety or depression before ADHD.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 22:39:48+00:00; ;1375215869631025155;en;1634;14;2;148;Twitter for iPhone;"We perceive the rejection before it happens
column4: because it happened before. This leads to not opening up to new friends
column5: romantic partners
column6: or starting new projects because they may feel like they’re not good enough.

column1: A lot of us also become people pleasers due to this sensitivity."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 22:39:47+00:00; ;1375215868104282112;en;1378;16;2;135;Twitter for iPhone;"This leads me to my final point of this thread: Rejection Sensitivity.

column1: People with ADHD are more sensitive to anything they perceive as criticism
column2: being disregarded or rejected. This is also due to the stats that those with ADHD are often excluded from their peers ⤵️"

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 22:35:32+00:00; ;1375214796661010445;en;1946;57;3;200;Twitter for iPhone;Something minuscule like a change of sudden plans or an inconvenience (like missing your bus stop) can be very mentally difficult for those who have ADHD. They’re not overreacting. It’s a result of trying to do things right all the time and feeling like you don’t succeed.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 22:35:32+00:00; ;1375214794945527808;en;1619;10;2;188;Twitter for iPhone;"What people don’t talk about regarding ADHD is that’s not just the disorganization of your entire life
column4: it’s also the disorganization of your emotional state.

column1: Emotional regulation is difficult with those with ADHD.
This leads to outbursts and how most of us also have anxiety."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 18:34:03+00:00; ;1375154025033830406;en;449;1;3;65;Twitter for iPhone;More information on 3 types of ADHD and the dominant symptoms of ADHD like the lack of emotional regulation and rejection sensitivity: https://t.co/MMweTCE8Q9

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 18:20:29+00:00; ;1375150611314970626;en;1684;33;4;134;Twitter for iPhone;"Combination Type ADH:

column1: Those that struggle with a combination of symptoms with inattentive & hyperactive. Such as:
• Difficultly switching over tasks
• Difficultly starting new tasks
• Anything that involves a lot of mental thought is a stressor"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 17:49:41+00:00; ;1375142859419045891;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@my_ka_lee Me too 💛

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 17:49:24+00:00; ;1375142791156801540;en;2;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;@ONarvo @blkgirllostkeys is an amazing resource for black people with ADHD

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 17:48:52+00:00; ;1375142656607653890;en;7;0;2;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@ONarvo Your brain is how your brain is! And you don’t need to change that to assimilate into a society that can’t handle different ways of thinking.

column1: That being said
column2: there are so many different avenues to support yourself and learn what works for YOU so symptoms can be manageable!"

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 17:45:53+00:00; ;1375141902803210241;en;15;0;2;1;Twitter for iPhone;@nichellespeaks I agree! That’s basically the goal of advocating for neurodiversity. Because we are trying to assimilate into a world that doesn’t desire to accommodate us
column4: and we shouldn’t have to!

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 17:43:40+00:00; ;1375141344671363080;en;1355;14;6;95;Twitter for iPhone;"People with inattentive type are more than likely to drop-out and spontaneously quit their jobs because the burdens have reached their peak.

column1: The last type of ADHD is Combination Type. Which is basically the merge of the other two different types!"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 17:38:54+00:00; ;1375140145997971458;en;1597;16;3;113;Twitter for iPhone;"Those with this type will miss deadlines constantly
column4: projects will pile up easily and cause them to be overwhelmed even if it’s urgent. Poor performance in school and work (and even home life) is due to this.

column1: ADHD people have higher divorce rates than their neurotypical peers."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 17:38:54+00:00; ;1375140144869748738;en;2195;44;2;208;Twitter for iPhone;"Inattentive ADHD is a diagnosis that is presented in a lot of adults & those of marginalized genders.

column1: It’s not just zoning out. It’s the inability to remember things
column3: or even keeping up with loved ones. Returning phones calls and messages is non-existent."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 17:38:53+00:00; ;1375140143443673089;en;2524;82;12;264;Twitter for iPhone;"Predominantly Inattentive (ADD)

column1: This is the type of ADHD that is missed a lot in girls because it’s not distractive and the pressure to “fit in” is more intuitive
• Lack of focus
• Dazing out in conversation
• Disorganization
• Losing/misplacing things
• Poor memory"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 17:29:52+00:00; ;1375137872496451586;en;1086;3;2;84;Twitter for iPhone;"Hyperactive ADHD is what you see diagnosed a lot in young white boys
column4: because a lot of educators don’t note down anything until it becomes a “distraction” to the class.

column1: This ADHD may be “over diagnosed” in boys
column2: but ADHD is under diagnosed in (black) children
column3: girls and adults."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 17:29:51+00:00; ;1375137871158513665;en;1095;4;1;67;Twitter for iPhone;Those with a the hyperactive type struggle to feel stimulated and can get “bored” very easily
column4: they can struggle with sleeping because their mind’s race
column5: they struggle with completing tasks—even if it’s urgent.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 17:29:51+00:00; ;1375137869845696516;en;1182;10;2;92;Twitter for iPhone;"Predominantly Hyperactive Type:

column1: This type is probably what you think of when you think of ADHD.
• Impulsivity (like impulsive spending
• Fidgeting
• Talking over others/talking too much
• Blurting out things
• Struggling to stay seated (as children)"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 16:37:57+00:00; ;1375124808833318916;en;19;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@dreaalexand Yes
column4: a rabbit hole of information that I want to share with everybody! Just neurodivergent things 😂

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 16:35:23+00:00; ;1375124163145445379;en;2540;62;35;611;Twitter for iPhone;Here in this thread
column4: I have time again to talk about the 3 types of ADHD. And how emotional regulation and rejection sensitivity are one of many defining components you could probably recognize in an ADHD person

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 16:32:58+00:00; ;1375123555613081603;en;1148;7;3;186;Twitter for iPhone;"You’re not gonna be able to pray away cognitive disorders or choose to not believe them.

column1: A loved one could be silently suffering without the access to get help & the support. It will benefit the entire community to advocate for everybody in it."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 16:32:58+00:00; ;1375123554568699904;en;2745;34;24;579;Twitter for iPhone;"The amount of people in the quotes saying ADHD is not real or an excuse to dope up children.

column1: It is 2021. Please stop listening to Joe Rogan. https://t.co/pIacrgV8O6"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 16:18:51+00:00; ;1375119999795363844;en;8;0;3;0;Twitter for iPhone;@Imsoojassy I believe that hyperactive ADHD is overdiagnosed in young white boys—and inattentive/combination is extremely underdiagnosed. Especially if you’re black
column4: especially if you’re of a marginalized gender
column5: especially if you’re an adult.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 09:37:15+00:00; ;1375018937306472453;en;111;0;1;12;Twitter for iPhone;"I’m so much of an advocate that I’m going through academia to protect and preserve African spiritual art & technology.

column1: In my latest research
column3: Princess Adedoyin and she informed me how these works are not being properly taken care of in certain museums."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 09:32:55+00:00; ;1375017846674231297;en;207;1;1;44;Twitter for iPhone;"I’m a huge advocate for returning all art to indigenous people because most museum visitors are white people. So
column4: when they say they’re housing all this art in metropolis hubs
column5: it’s not for indigenous groups to visit—it’s for consumption by the elite.

column1: The art industrial complex."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 09:25:04+00:00; ;1375015869156298753;en;106;0;1;24;Twitter for iPhone;"If you ask me
column4: everyone who stole from my people should have a heavy tax added to the return of the artwork. And to pay for the first few years of return housing and maintenance of these items.

column1: What’s so important about this? Let me educate you on an empire lost in Bronze. https://t.co/RY6SJASVCn"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 09:25:04+00:00; ;1375015868569153539;en;71;0;1;6;Twitter for iPhone;@britishmuseum you’re next.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 09:25:04+00:00; ;1375015867596087297;en;674;2;1;170;Twitter for iPhone;"This is huge. Majority of the bronzes came from ancestral altars and sacred spaces.

column1: First the bronzes
column2: next all the money you have made from showcasing pillaged art from our ancestors. https://t.co/UpTNrHYRLf"

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 08:25:08+00:00; ;1375000787512872961;en;6;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@my_ka_lee @blkgirllostkeys I LOVEEE her. Because of her work

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 07:14:44+00:00; ;1374983069627744258;en;10;0;0;0;Twitter for iPhone;"@_neeeeetz It’s only been a few days for me
column4: but it’s been liberating.

column1: Because just understanding my brain has led to less critical self-talk and more compassion. And being able to get referrals for treatment because a doc gave you a letter is a game changer. You can get adequate help!"

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 06:29:25+00:00; ;1374971665461968897;en;1706;1;5;85;Twitter for iPhone;"I know this is already long thread and I could definitely write more. But some of y’all also have ADHD so I’m not gonna do that to y’all.

column1: But to everybody else
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 06:26:11+00:00; ;1374970851939000322;en;15;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@CommunistCowgrl Listen
column4: learning about rejection sensitivity saved my life.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 06:25:27+00:00; ;1374970668501110786;en;89;0;2;2;Twitter for iPhone;@tweetatKeylan @Artyasadream I also recommend that you gain as much information as you can. Because medication can and is proven to help those with ADHD and it’s usually combined together during treatment plans. It’s okay to need medication! But that itself not enough to build mechanisms that can help you.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 06:18:16+00:00; ;1374968861670436867;en;1;0;1;0;Twitter for iPhone;@nappy_mermaid @BlackAutistics I’d love that!

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 06:09:29+00:00; ;1374966650496245765;en;2480;13;5;328;Twitter for iPhone;"Those with ADHD/ASD can suffer from depression and anxiety due to a lack of treatment & lack of support in a neurotypical world.

column1: If you believe there is something wrong don’t stop till you get the answers you need. And if you can’t
column2: surround yourself with people that understand."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 06:09:29+00:00; ;1374966648969564164;en;2487;5;3;345;Twitter for iPhone;"I urge you to be kind to others. Because a lot of people in our community are out here with no accessibility for diagnosis on mood/cognitive disorders.

column1: And when we try to get them done
column2: nobody believes our symptoms. I urge you to advocate for yourself."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 06:02:00+00:00; ;1374964767425753088;en;3278;10;4;504;Twitter for iPhone;"ADHD is not a “boy disease”

column1: Girls and others of marginalized genders are extremely under-diagnosed
And if you’re black and adding the pressure of your own community and family who don’t believe in mental health?
Well you gotta fend for yourself."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 05:56:31+00:00; ;1374963384861478916;en;3320;6;3;457;Twitter for iPhone;The poster child for ADHD is an impulsive white boy—and that’s what educators and *professionals* look for when evaluating children (and adults)
column4: rather than acknowledging how ADHD falls under 3 types and is a spectrum.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-25 05:56:30+00:00; ;1374963383607382017;en;3823;41;8;591;Twitter for iPhone;"Teachers due to racial bias would rather suspend the black girl for talking too much rather than interrogate why.

column1: Would rather give detention to the black boy for being loud.
Would rather humiliate the black child for not paying attention in class rather than interrogate why."

column4: and praise in the tradition. ⤵️"

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-17 02:48:17+00:00; ;1372016914847961090;en;522;4;3;53;Twitter for iPhone;"And it’s usually because of each food has a spiritual significance. For example
column4: someone has a taboo to not eat corn. Corn has attachments to abundance
column5: so the person would be eating their wealth.

column1: These taboos are unique for EACH destiny. Let people eat what works for them."

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-17 02:45:50+00:00; ;1372016294619459589;en;369;2;2;24;Twitter for iPhone;It’s also important to say that in this tradition we believe we choose our taboos before we descend down onto Earth. column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-16 19:45:38+00:00; ;1371910548779061255;en;230;0;1;20;Twitter for iPhone;"For those who desire love and feel like they’re ready for it
column4: check out my patreon on a foolproof guide for clearing out the old and bringing in greater love ⚡️

column1: https://t.co/VN5aAlRHZ3"
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-16 19:45:38+00:00; ;1371910547709509639;en;1434;9;5;266;Twitter for iPhone;You can do all the self-love healing in this world and still want a partner. And that’s okay. Desiring someone is not a trait that marks you as “not healed”
column4: it makes you a normal human being who wants companionship.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-16 19:34:34+00:00; ;1371907763211763715;en;1807;18;9;376;Twitter for iPhone;What I don’t like is how others have co-opted self-love as a benchmark in order to receive love. You are worthy of love
column4: right now—as you are.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-16 19:31:24+00:00; ;1371906965677432832;en;2442;18;4;532;Twitter for iPhone;"Healing is not linear. Yes
column4: you can pursue self-love and still desire a relationship. Yes
column5: you can be in the process of healing and still want a partner.

column1: There is no checkpoint in healing that makes someone more worthy to receive love than someone else."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-16 19:31:23+00:00; ;1371906964972789766;en;42961;584;53;9040;Twitter for iPhone;You don’t need to be completely healed in order to be worthy of love.

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-15 22:30:44+00:00; ;1371589708736827394;en;11929;84;15;3542;Buffer;I forgive myself for not knowing what I know now.

column4: who is known for great wealth and opulence
column5: blesses us with her presence.

column1: On this Monday
column2: may you find the abundance you are seeking."

column4: for allowing it as long as I did. Forgiving myself for opening up as I did.

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-15 18:30:30+00:00; ;1371529255088226304;en;14878;170;53;3543;Buffer;You hold a lot of pain from people who will never apologize. column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango

column4: if we do hold friends to a different standard—wouldn’t there be more thorough communication and spaces for dialogue? We’d rather choose loneliness over conflict resolution.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-14 19:05:05+00:00; ;1371175567681335302;en;855;12;1;180;Twitter for iPhone;"When we know friendship plays a vital role in good mental health—yet
column4: we have the least tolerance with our platonic connections.

column1: The way you treat your friends says more about your relationship to intimacy than your love interest."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-14 18:59:17+00:00; ;1371174110823333896;en;1173;11;7;233;Twitter for iPhone;"Some of us can give a plethora of chances to our love interests
column4: but don’t have the same grace with our own friends.

column1: Why are we so quick to cut friends off but endure toxicity in romance? This could be the reason why loneliness is more prevalent than ever."
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-14 18:59:17+00:00; ;1371174109137285120;en;6552;285;27;1331;Twitter for iPhone;I wish we gave our friends the amount of chances we give our lovers.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-14 17:38:08+00:00; ;1371153685175267332;en;1222;10;1;281;Twitter for iPhone;"Self-validation will get you further than the external.

column1: And when you realize that you have been doing things with the motive of sharing them to other people

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-14 14:30:34+00:00; ;1371106484675883009;en;16973;162;32;3849;Buffer;Get out of the habit of trying to show everybody your accomplishments and enjoy them for yourself instead.

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-14 01:41:26+00:00; ;1370912923779006469;en;1589;20;27;226;Twitter for iPhone;If you been lonely lately and wonder if you’ll ever have that friend group—you will. The people who will love you with their entire heart are soon arriving.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-14 01:34:39+00:00; ;1370911219721367554;en;2244;27;6;552;Twitter for iPhone;"You are deserving of friends with true intentions. Friends who love you
column4: who make you feel safe and taken care of. Friends without ulterior motives
column5: friends who tell you the truth.

column1: Friends who hold space for you
column2: just like how you hold space for others."

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-03-14 01:30:48+00:00; ;1370910249062952970;en;11453;119;18;2617;Buffer;Yes
column4: you are deserving of genuine friendships.

column1: If you’re spiraling

column4: your thing is important. Yes
column5: you deserve love. Yes
column6: you are enough."

But don’t underestimate the living body that holds the essence of your entire lineage
column4: known and unknown.

column1: Ancestral veneration really gives us a chance to meet the ones we have never met
column2: and reunite with the ones who have already left."

column4: the big toe is what connects us to the realm of the ancestors. This is why death of a loved one can be literally straining on the body.

column4: statement and actions. You deserve to not terrorize your own mind by trying to figure out the needs of others.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-02-28 02:24:18+00:00; ;1365850284455563269;en;832;2;3;137;Twitter for iPhone;"The Creator gave you great blessings to take down to earth from the heavens
column4: and that’s not something that can be easily taken away by a human.

column1: Please don’t get hypnotized by scarcity that you forget to give yourself grace. Your destiny
column2: your goals should never be a competition."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-02-28 02:21:51+00:00; ;1365849667951542273;en;1049;13;4;205;Twitter for iPhone;"We push products that aren’t ready
column4: offer services that aren’t seasoned
column5: and give so much of ourselves so soon.

column1: And it’s usually for one reason: Being afraid of being left behind and forgotten.
Please know that it’s your divine right to take your time."

column2: that you are worthy of it."

column4: one has wealth. Living fully can create more abundance than living for accolades. Enjoy your life.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-02-07 16:44:08+00:00; ;1358456520443392002;en;105;0;2;6;Twitter for iPhone;If I feel stress
column4: even if it’s from my business—my egbe will actually stop my career flow because it stresses me too much. I always lay offerings to let them know to not block my growth. Egbe just wants you ok! And if Earth has been very hard
column5: they can (and will) take you back.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-02-07 16:39:13+00:00; ;1358455285048868867;en;62;0;2;3;Twitter for iPhone;"Egbe can affect your personal relationships too
column4: so if I know conflict is occurring in my connections for no reason I go lay offerings to my egbe.

column1: It’s also important to closely listen to your egbe when they instruct you
column2: like in your dreams etc. to avoid fighting with them."

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-02-07 16:39:13+00:00; ;1358455284084207626;en;71;0;1;4;Twitter for iPhone;"My egbe orun will actually hold blessings from me when I’m not in alignment with my destiny.

column1: Egbe also just desires attention from you to be in agreement with them. So laying offerings consistently is a great way!"

column1: From personal experience
column2: I know I’m in alignment with my promises to egbe when weird chaos stops. When I can accomplish goals without delay or unforeseen blockages. https://t.co/XItF5jDl7e"

column1: Be mindful of people.
There will be others who are attracted to your light without reason. It is up to you to not confuse attraction and desire with genuine friendship."

column3: the blessings you receive etc.

column1: Beware of fans disguised as friends. They can easily become enemies."

column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-02-04 15:30:20+00:00; ;1357350785571512328;en;12601;84;16;3231;Buffer;What you speak over yourself in the mornings becomes your destiny. Speak words of victory
column4: of action
column5: of faith—of all good things so your life can become good too.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-02-03 15:30:29+00:00; ;1356988437786746881;en;3837;24;7;829;Buffer;We leave fragments of ourselves on whatever we attach ourselves to. Take care of your energetic footprint.

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-02-03 08:37:03+00:00; ;1356884393869135872;en;80;0;3;6;Twitter Web App;"The 401 Irunmole who descend down to Earth also created human forms that became orishas. The 401 Irunmole are the ones that are popular: Obatala
column4: Esu
column5: Osun
column6: Olokun

column1: Then the orishas: Erinle
column3: Oya
column4: Oba etc"

column1: 751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-02-03 08:37:03+00:00; ;1356884393097375753;en;70;0;1;4;Twitter Web App;"The Irunmoles are aspects of the Creator. There are a total of 801 Irunmole. 200 seated at the left side of the Creator
column4: 200 seated at the right. And 401 that go back and forth between (Orun) Heaven and Earth (Aye).

column1: Irunmole can be orisha
751504248760897537;ehimeora;iya ehime ora;Writer • Author • Ancestors Storyteller • Art & Spirit • Sango
column3: Erinle Priestess • ADHD/Autistic • She/They • IG: ehimeora • hi@ehimeora.com;11267;Paciente;TEA;TDAH;nan;2021-02-03 08:37:03+00:00; ;1356884392355000321;en;55;0;1;4;Twitter Web App;Irunmoles have existed ever since Akamara blew their breath and created the entire cosmos. It was the Irunmole that was instructed by the Creator to cool down the stars

column4: it’s time to do what you planned on doing rather than thinking about doing it. Capricorn is cardinal
column5: meaning it moves forward. You can’t move forward if you’re still in the same spot thinking about moving. Accountability
column6: not perfection.

column4: it’s time to nourish the connections that leave both parties full.

column1: How do you feel when you talk to someone? If your body feels uncomfortable
column2: that’s a sign. There’s a boundary being crossed."

column4: don’t let burial ceremonies create anxiety in your spirit. You honoring her wishes can be enough.

column4: please don’t assume. If there’s something that your family or religion personally does for burials
column5: write it down and keep track of it. We can avoid so much generational curses by doing this properly.

column4: to not take disagreements personally

column2: and that’s okay. It doesn’t make you a bad person."

column2: facades and fake personas  aren’t necessary to do powerful work."

column1: The Moon didn’t want to listen. Because of ego and trying to override destiny
column2: it wanted to take the role of the Sun and rise. This created imbalance in the world.

column1: The Sun rising first made all things right. Your position is important
